result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrie M Griffin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay all applicable court costs and fees by 07/06/16 or civil judgment.
Consecutive to: To any other sentence.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetrie M Griffin

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Demetrie M Griffin in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Demetrie M Griffin in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

AS TO COUNT 1:

The Court ordered defendant to serve 30 days in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 0 (zero) days time served.  

Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and fees by July 6, 2016, or to be docketed as a civil judgment.


Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.

Defendant Demetrie M Griffin in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Demetrie M Griffin in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

AS TO COUNT 1:

Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.   Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 37.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Demetrie M Griffin not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing. Court is in trial and unable to hear this case today.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.
Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Demetrie M Griffin not in court, in custody and not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. Defense counsel received new discovery at today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Demetrie M Griffin not in court, in custody and not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Pretrial conference held off the record.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. Defense counsel is in jury trial in another court and has conflict in schedule.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for March 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Demetrie M Griffin in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Defendant Demetrie M Griffin in custody.  Sarra M. Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
